changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE animal( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, weight REAL NOT NULL, comment TEXT, spice_id INT NOT NULL, sex_id INT NOT NULL, color_id INT NOT NULL, fur_id INT NOT NULL, ear_id INT NOT NULL, tail_id INT NOT NULL, size_id INT NOT NULL, creator_id INT NOT NULL, card_number TEXT, status INT, file_id INT, CONSTRAINT animal_status CHECK (animal.status IN (-1, 0, 1)), FOREIGN KEY (spice_id) REFERENCES dict_species(id), FOREIGN KEY (sex_id) REFERENCES dict_sex(id), FOREIGN KEY (color_id) REFERENCES dict_color(id), FOREIGN KEY (fur_id) REFERENCES dict_fur(id), FOREIGN KEY (ear_id) REFERENCES dict_ear(id), FOREIGN KEY (tail_id) REFERENCES dict_tail(id), FOREIGN KEY (size_id) REFERENCES dict_size(id), FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES account(id), FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES file(id) );
